Class GameConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameLogic.GameConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class GameConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The game settings.
    Author:
    Afonso Pinto and Tomás Oliveira
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                  int columns,
                  char downKey,

                  char rightKey,
                  char upKey)
        Constructs and initializes the game settings and default keyboard configuration.
        Parameters:
        rows - the number of rows
        columns - the number of columns
        downKey - the keyboard key for down movement
        leftKey - the keyboard key for left movement
        rightKey - the keyboard key for right movement
        upKey - the keyboard key for up movement
